articles.title: Leave Ukraine, India tells its citizens as Russia steps up missile strikes - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Indian advisory on Thursday followed one issued on October 10 that only urged Indians to avoid all non-essential travel to and within Ukraine. On Thursday, New Delhi asked all citizens to leave by available means | Latest News India
